Package org.kiji.schema.layout.impl

Implementation for Kiji table layout management.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ZooKeeperMonitor.LayoutUpdateHandler Interface for trackers of a table's layout.
ZooKeeperMonitor.UsersUpdateHandler Interface for trackers of a table's users.
 

Class Summary
CellDecoderProvider Provider for cell decoders of a given table.
CellEncoderProvider Provider for cell encoders of a given table.
ColumnId A very short physical identifier for a column family or qualifier to be used in HBase.
HBaseNativeColumnNameTranslator Translates between HTable and Kiji table column names.
HBaseTableLayoutDatabase Manages Kiji table layouts using a column family in an HBase table as a backing store.
HTableSchemaTranslator Translates between KijiTableLayouts and HTableDescriptors.
IdentityColumnNameTranslator Translates between HTable and Kiji table column names.
InstanceMonitor A Kiji instance monitor.
LayoutCapsule Container class encapsulating the KijiTableLayout and related objects which must all reflect layout updates atomically.
ShortColumnNameTranslator Translates between HTable and Kiji table column names.
TableLayoutMonitor TableLayoutMonitor provides three services for users of table layouts: 1) it acts as a KijiTableLayout cache which is automatically refreshed when the table layout is updated.
TableLayoutUpdateValidator Validates a table layout update.
ZooKeeperClient Deprecated. use a CuratorFramework instead.
ZooKeeperMonitor Deprecated. use the ZooKeeper recipes in the org.kiji.schema.zookeeper package instead.
 

Package org.kiji.schema.layout.impl Description

Implementation for Kiji table layout management.

Users generally shouldn't need to reference any of these classes directly, but rather use the classes presented by the org.kiji.schema package.
